description: This file defines REST API routes for managing products, including endpoints to list, retrieve, create, update, and delete products. It utilizes Express router, references a product controller for handler implementations, and includes Swagger annotations for API documentation.

methods.name: router.get
methods.description: Defines GET endpoint to list all products

methods.name: router.get('/:id')
methods.description: Defines GET endpoint to retrieve a product by ID

methods.name: router.post
methods.description: Defines POST endpoint to create a new product, with validation middleware

methods.name: router.put('/:id')
methods.description: Defines PUT endpoint to update a product by ID, with validation middleware

methods.name: router.delete('/:id')
methods.description: Defines DELETE endpoint to delete a product by ID
